Package dispatcher

Class IVCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dispatcher.IVCounter
  • public class IVCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is based on the concept of an initialization vector (IV) plus a counter. An initial start value is determined and can be incremented. This is to avoid collisions. There is absolutely no guarantee regarding cryptographic robustness and so on. In fact, the author just wanted to "play" a bit with these concepts :-)
